trans-unit.source: Provides a custom <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.CategoryEditor"></xref> to use for grouping properties that are displayed in a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGrid"></xref>.
Creates a new instance of the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.CategoryEditor"></xref> class.
Determines which properties are edited by the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.CategoryEditor"></xref>.

The <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyEntry"></xref> instance that is checked to determine whether it is included among those properties edited by the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.CategoryEditor"></xref>.
`true` if this editor edits the specified property; otherwise, `false`.
Creates a new <xref href="System.ComponentModel.EditorAttribute"></xref> for the specified <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.CategoryEditor"></xref>.
The <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.CategoryEditor"></xref> for which to create a new <xref href="System.ComponentModel.EditorAttribute"></xref>.
Creates a new <xref href="System.ComponentModel.EditorAttribute"></xref> for the specified <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.CategoryEditor"></xref> type.
The <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.CategoryEditor"></xref> type for which to create the new <xref href="System.ComponentModel.EditorAttribute"></xref>.

Gets a <xref href="System.Windows.DataTemplate"></xref> that is hosted by the property inspector to provide the user interface for a <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.CategoryEditor"></xref>.
Returns an <xref href="System.Object"></xref> that the host can display in a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl"></xref>.
The desired <xref href="T.Systems.Windows.Size"></xref> of the image to return.
An <xref href="System.Object"></xref> to display in the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl"></xref>.
Gets a localized string that indicates to which category the editor belongs.
Category editors are defined on types and, thus, at load time they need to indicate to which category they belong.
A <xref href="System.String"></xref> that represents the editor category.
